comments.content: Men use the toilet both ways and are expected to raise or lower the seat as needed.   Is it too much for a women to look before she plops down?

This has happened to me. I do not turn lights on so as not to wake hubby up. Have fallen in several times and he has been scolded about it! But the worst time was when our guest stayed and they put the top down also so their dog cannot drink toilet water. Ooooooo!!! So wished i had turned the light on that time. Got revenge though as i woke them up trying to do cleanup!
Happened when I was pregnant and had to get up at night = no lights on because I was sleepwalking o the bathroom.  What a surprise when I fell in.
It only happened once at our house and some one heard about it for days.
Dang. I feel if a man can put the seat up a woman can put it down.
Our BIG Tomcat like to drink from the porcelain fountain so the seat is always put back Up in our house lol
Not only a quality referee but a good quality umpire! I enjoyed umpiring some games with you yrs ago!
Bobby always felt great when I saw U were the referee

description: What an exciting day.  Today we officially launch the Arizona Door Store - a dream of mine for a LONG TIME!  As most of you know I've spent a career in this business with some of the best suppliers in the world.  I honestly love the door and window business - it has become part of me over the years. You know I can talk about it for hours!  I have always dreamed of a premier, locally-owned shop wit ... h a huge variety of products and highly personalized service. After years of planning and hard work, our license is official, installers and products are ready, and our website is live at  www.arizonadoorstore.com.   We'll be providing full service door and window replacement to the entire Phoenix market.  This means we've got every residential door style covered and multiple window styles available.  French doors, sliding doors, entry doors, stacking doors, interior doors, barn doors, storm doors, screen doors, wood windows, fiberglass windows, vinyl windows...Pumped up yet?  I am!    We'll build the store through word of mouth, social media, and a large online presence.  If you have a moment, check out our Instagram feed at  instagram.com/ arizonadoorstore  and/or like our Facebook page  Arizona Door Store .  Much more to come- this is just the tip of the iceberg for the Arizona Door Store.  Coupons are live on the website if you need some work done before summer!   See More

description: FYI:  Marlow Family Reunion potluck 8/6/17 12:15-3:45 in Salem, IL at First Christian Church 1200 W Boone St. This will be our first try at our church without any fees. It's in the west gym with a kitchen, air conditioning & basketball goals. All types of balls are already there. Our last of 3 services on the east end is from 11:00-12:00 so that's why the 12:15 start. Hope to see all of you there!!!

comments.content: The trick is to lower the volume for minute before you change the channel !!:-)

This is so your dad, he goes to sleep with the remote in his hand and his finger on a button lol I got an extra remote so when he goes to sleep I can turn the volume down and then change the channel....
Oh my gosh.  That was my Dad!  He would be snoring in his recliner and if we changed the channel Bam!!
That's real,  Carlisa Thomas Timpson . Sometimes what's playing gets incorporated into my dream and my brain puts it's own spin on things 😁 . I'm still "watching" so put that remote down, lol
That is Dan and I only I can reach over and push the buttons without taking it out of his vice grip.  Sometime he yells "I was watching that" when it is on the guide.
Reminds me of dad. Watching tv, reading newspaper and listening to radio all at the same time, while sleeping.  Marilyn Hall   Angelia Borden   Tony W Borden
